English.Text: Your crew must trust themselves to the man of god. After all, he seems devoted to helping you cleanse Montoya of heresy. "No, I have not seen them," he begins, "but many of my flock have lately confessed their fearsâ€” their lost faith." He smiles blithely, and leads you from the church to a decrepit warehouse on the dock. "If you too wish to rid yourself of your demons, I encourage yout to begin here." Now forgive me, for I cannot abide violence," he says, taking his leave. You can try to break the warehouse door, or you can sneak around the back.
